transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens to a given address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one address to another using allowance.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made by an owner to a spender.

Transfer.description: Emitted when a transfer of tokens occurs.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with default parameters.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from an owner’s account.

approve.description: Sets the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller’s account.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a given address.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller’s account.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller’s account.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.
